mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule.information (id,performance_id,fix_date,open_time,start_time,ticket_price,budget,memo,implession) VALUES (#{schedule.scheduleId.value}, #{schedule.performanceId.value}, #{schedule.scheduledDate.value}, CAST(#{schedule.openTime.open} AS TIME), CAST(#{schedule.startTime.start} AS TIME), #{schedule.ticketPrice.integerValue}, #{schedule.budget.integerValue}, #{schedule.memo.value}, #{schedule.implessions.value});
mapper.select: SELECT schedule.information.id, performance.information.name, schedule.information.fix_date, schedule.information.open_time, schedule.information.start_time FROM schedule.information INNER JOIN performance.information ON performance.information.id = schedule.information.performance_id;
